dashboard.description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via Prometheus plugin in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

targets.expr: sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, state)
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, state)

sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, state)

sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"active|reading|writing|waiting", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, state)
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="total", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"})
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="handled", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"})
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state="accepted", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"})
sum by (chain, servicetype, network, region, ) (rate(kong_http_requests_total{chain="SUI", network="testnet"}[1m]))
sum(rate(kong_http_requests_total{service=~"$service", route=~"$route", chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,code)

panels.title: RPS per Region by status code

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_request_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_kong_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(kong_upstream_latency_ms_bucket{service =~ "$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service,le))
sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])*8) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, type)

sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{exported_direction="egress", service =~"$service",route=~"$route",chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service)
sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{exported_direction="ingress", service =~"$service", chain="SUI", servicetype="fullnode", network="testnet"}[1m])) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, service)

sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state="healthy",upstream=~"$upstream", chain="SUI", network="testnet", servicetype="fullnode"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, upstream,target,address) * -1  + sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state=~"(unhealthy|dns_error)",upstream=~"$upstream", chain="SUI", network="testnet", servicetype="fullnode"}) by (chain, servicetype, network, region, upstream,target,address)
kong_memory_workers_lua_vms_bytes{chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region"}

panels.title: Kong worker Lua VM usage by Node [$region]

targets.expr: (kong_memory_lua_shared_dict_bytes{chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region",shared_dict!~"kong_process_events"}/kong_memory_lua_shared_dict_total_bytes{chain=~"SUI", servicetype=~"fullnode", network=~"testnet", region=~"$region",shared_dict!~"kong_process_events"})*100

panels.title: Kong shared memory usage by Node [$region]

dashboard.title: Kong - Sui Testnet Fullnode
